review:
He is like my family doctor. I have been visting him since my tuberculosis issue and therafter also consulted him regarding my malaria. In both the situations he stood best than the rest and cured the issue of malaria within 5 days and a year for TB. Compared to reputed all india institute of medical .... doctors who diagnosed my issue as lung cancer and misguided me for almost 6 months due to which it converted into TB, he was right on the spot from the scratch regarding diagnosis and treatment. I also advised my family members and friends for consulting him for various medical issues ranging from severe fevers to chronic fissures all of them resulted in positive treatment.

Notable aspect - If he read your bodily conditions and medical history accurately then you can consult him for almost every issue for which he is capable of treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I recommend this doctor. Do visit and all your queries will be solved . He is humble and listens to the patient calmly.

Ther is an old saying that God can not attend everybody, so he created Doctors to do his job
But we had horrible experience with one of these God's messengers.
We brought our patient( my father) to BLK super speciality hospital after telephonically  contacting Dr. R.K.Singhal on 6-5-23 and there was some confusion regarding the category(general or PSU) and Dr. Singhal was so much  offended by learning that patient belonged to PSU category and not to the General category that he refused  to visit patient in Emergency ward and our patient was discharged from emergency ward itself. We immediately shifted him to a nearby hospital *** *** ****** ** **** ** *** ************* *** ***** ***** ********* ******* ***********

Very good experience. 
I suggest to all for cure.
He is not just doctor.
He is like god for all patients who Consult him.
